attributes.action: enforce a thirty mile per hour speed limit on the Turnpike corner on of Shaftesbury road.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: enforce a 30 mile per hour speed limit on shaftesbury road onthe turnpike corner. This part of the road is an accident black spot, and drivers need to be informed of this.

rejection.details: Can you state in your petition title where in the country you're referring to
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
